personal_info.summary: Data Engineer with four years of experience architecting distributed data systems. Expert in Scala, Apache Spark, and functional programming, with a focus on building privacy-compliant data frameworks, modernizing legacy pipelines, and designing AI agent systems. Background in cognitive science informs approach to system design, particularly in metacognitive architectures combining deterministic validation with LLM reasoning. Technical owner of warehouse-wide data governance frameworks and developer productivity tooling.
